Dear Majdi,

 

I hope you're doing well.

 

Could you kindly provide the following details so that Hagop can proceed with processing the insurance for the newly opened Guess store at Mall of Oman:

 

*	Stock (Landed Cost and any one-time costs)
*	Contents (CAPEX - Gross Value)
*	Business Interruption (6-month estimated Gross Profit Value)

Once we have these details, Hagop will be able to complete the necessary insurance documentation.

 

Thank you for your assistance, and please feel free to reach out if you need any further information.

 

Best regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​
